titles.title: Death Tax Termination Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the estate and gift taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/3/2001--Introduced. Death Tax Termination Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the estate tax, gift tax, and the tax on generation-skipping transfers.
